<line: 21> RE: American Home Mortgage Servicing, lnc. Loan No:.
<line: 22> Borrower(s):
<line: 23> Encumbered Property Address:

[TEXT]
<line: 25> ORIGINAL MORTGAGE AMOUNT: $650,000.00
<line: 26> FIRST PAYMENT DATE:
<line: 27> 05/01/2007

[TEXT]
<line: 29> Pursuant to the terms of the Promissory Note and/or Security Instrument along with all Riders thereto, which were
<line: 30> executed by the Borrower(s) in connection with the Loan (both as referenced above), you are hereby served notice of the
<line: 31> following:

[TEXT]
<line: 33> (a) The Promissory Note and/or Security lnstrument, including all Riders thereto, are presently in default due to the
<line: 34> non-payment of the 07/01/2008 and the subsequent payments..

[TEXT]
<line: 36> (b) The total amount currently due on the Loan in order to cure the default, is as follows:

[TEXT]
<line: 38> $8,227.14
<line: 39> $358.86
<line: 40> $0.00
<line: 41> $0.00
<line: 42> ($886.43)
<line: 43> $7,699.57

[TEXT]
<line: 45> Total Monthly Payment(s) Due:
<line: 46> Accrued Late Charges:
<line: 47> NSF Fee Due:
<line: 48> Other Fees Due:
<line: 49> Less Suspense Amount:

[TEXT]
<line: 51> 1f any other payments or expenses become due at or prior to the time an attempt is made to cure this default, they
<line: 52> will be added to the Total Due and must also be paid in order to cure the default.

[TEXT]
<line: 54> (c) To cure this default, payment must be made, IN THE FORM OF CERTIFIED FUNDS (CASHIER'S CHECK,
<line: 55> MONEY ORDER OR QUICK COLLECT), in the full amount as stated above per item (b), directly to AMERICAN
<line: 56> HOME MORTGAGE SERVICING, INC as follows:

[TEXT]
<line: 58> Overnight Mail Address
<line: 59> American Home Mortgage Servicing, Inc.
<line: 60> 4600 Regent Blvd., Suite 200
<line: 61> Irving, TX 75063-1730

[TEXT]
<line: 63> Western Union Quick Collect
<line: 64>  Pay to: American Home Mortgage Servicing, Inc.
<line: 65> Code City: Option
<line: 66> Code State: CA

[TEXT]
<line: 68> (d) 1f American Home Mortgage Servicing, Inc is not in possession of the amount that is necessary to cure the default
<line: 69> within 30 days of the date of this notice, American Home Mortgage Servicing, Inc will accelerate the Loan balance
<line: 70> and proceed with foreclosure. In such case, the Encumbered Property, as referenced above, will be sold at a duly
<line: 71> held foreclosure sale or sheriff's sale and all occupants will be required to vacate.

[TEXT]
<line: 5> (e) You are further advised that the Borrower(s) shall have the right to reinstate the Loan after acceleration and the right
<line: 6> to bring any defenses that may exist to the acceleration and sale, including a court action to assert the non-existence
<line: 7> of a default.

[TITLE]
<line: 9> THIS IS AN ATTEMPT TO COLLECT A DEBT AND ANY INFORMATION OBTAINED WILL BE USED FOR
<line: 10> THAT PURPOSE. THIS DOES NOT IMPLY THAT AMERICAN HOME MORTGAGE SERVICING, INC IS
<line: 11> ATTEMPTING TO COLLECT MONEY FROM ANYONE WHOSE DEBT HAS BEEN DISCHARGED UNDER
<line: 12> THE BANKRUPTCY LAWS OF THE UNITED STATES.

[TEXT]
<line: 14> As required by law, you are hereby notified that a NEGATIVE CREDIT REPORT reflecting on the Borrower's credit.
<line: 15> record may be submitted to a credit reporting agency if the Borrower fails to fulfill the terms of the obligations under the
<line: 16> Loan.

[TEXT]
<line: 18> IF YOU DID NOT SIGN THE NOTE BUT HOLD A LEGAL OR BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN THE
<line: 19> ENCUMBERED PROPERTY, THIS NOTICE IS PROVIDED TO YOU AS A COURTESY TO WARN YOU THAT
<line: 20> IF THE FULL AMOUNT DUE ON THE LOAN IS NOT PAID AS SET FORTH ABOVE, YOU MAY LOSE YOUR
<line: 21> INTEREST IN THE ENCUMBERED PROPERTY.

[TEXT]
<line: 23> American Home Mortgage Servicing, Inc is dedicated to providing the best customer service possible. Should you have
<line: 24> any questions regarding this matter, you may contact an American Home Mortgage Servicing, Inc representative at (877)
<line: 25>  304-3100. American Home Mortgage Servicing, Inc's office hours are Monday through Friday 7am to 9pm CT, Saturday
<line: 26> 7am to 1pm CT.
